page.title: 13Another extract from 1945 2b
page.content:
NEWBRIDGE IN 1945 _________________ researched by Sarah Probert
was illegal.Then the men would go up the wood and start again. For entertainment the kids would go to the cinema,there was one in Newbridge which I used to go to called The Grand.It was by the Redifussion offices next to the river,and I can remember the rats coming in.I never had any money,so,I would sneak in through the side door .The kids used to walk from Crumlin and Abercarn to go to the Grand,they did not catch the bus like they do now.People used to travel everywhere on bikes,though there were a few utility buses from Blackwood.They used these to go to the village to do their shopping,though most people used the corner shops.
